results.title: 北京3月20日0时至12时新增报告境外输入确诊病例6例
results.summary: 3月20日0时至12时，新增报告境外输入新冠肺炎确诊病例 6例, 美国、英国、西班牙各2例，治愈出院病例1例。截至3月20日12时，累计报告境外输入确诊病例76例，治愈出院病例7例。       3月20日0时至12时，无新增报告本地确诊病例，治愈出院病例5例。截至3月20日12时，累计报告本地确诊病例415例，治愈出院病例383例，治愈出院率92.3%。

results.title: Saudi Arabia to suspend all domestic flights and public transport for 14 days
results.summary: Saudi Arabia will shut down all domestic flights and public transportation -- including buses, taxis and trains -- for 14 days as a precautionary measure to control the spread of coronavirus, the country’s state news agency SPA said on Friday.

results.title: India restricts public transport
results.summary: With Prime Minister Narendra Modi asking all citizens to stay home to avoid the spread of the coronavirus, India's massive public transit systems are severely curtailing services.

results.title: Senate Intelligence chairman sold off stock ahead of coronavirus economic downturn
results.summary: Senate Intelligence Chairman Richard Burr and his wife sold as much as $1.7 million in stock last month ahead of the sharp market decline that's resulted from the novel coronavirus global pandemic, according to Senate documents.

results.title: 全球新冠肺炎死亡病例超万例
results.summary: 美国约翰斯·霍普金斯大学最新发布的数据显示，截至美国东部时间19日23时30分（北京时间20日11时30分），全球新冠肺炎死亡病例达到10030例。目前死亡病例最多的国家是意大利，达到3405例。

results.title: 25 people have now been killed by the coronavirus in Indonesia
results.summary: Twenty-five people in Indonesia who contracted the coronavirus have now died, according to the nation’s novel coronavirus response team spokesperson, Achmad Yurianto.

results.title: Saudi Arabia suspends domestic flights and trains for 14 days over coronavirus fears
results.summary: Saudi Arabia suspended on Friday all domestic flights, buses, taxis and trains for 14 days starting Saturday, state news agency reported quoting a source in interior ministry.

results.title: 又一艘公主号邮轮现新冠肺炎确诊病例
results.summary: “红宝石公主”号邮轮数名乘客确诊

results.title: 天津市无新增本地新冠肺炎确诊病例 报告境外输入确诊病例1例
results.summary: 3月19日6时至18时，天津市无新增本地新冠肺炎确诊病例，报告境外输入确诊病例1例，为英国输入病例。第1例境外输入病例，女，23岁，户籍天津市红桥区，在英国伦敦留学。目前已判定在津密切接触者29人，转运集中隔离点隔离医学观察。

results.title: 中国重剑队3名队员确诊新冠肺炎
results.summary: 据中国击剑协会：匈牙利当地时间3月16日，中国重剑队一行13人自匈牙利乘机返回国内。此前，队伍参加了3月6日-8日在匈牙利举行的世界杯大奖赛。接受入境检疫时，三名队员核酸检测阳性，确诊感染新冠肺炎，目前正在接受治疗和照顾。其他队员隔离接受医学观察，目前一切正常。
